title: 20th Century Girl
overview: Yeon-du asks her best friend Bora to collect all the information she can about Baek Hyun-jin while she is away in the U.S. for heart surgery. Bora decides to get close to Baek's best friend, Pung Woon-ho first. However, Bora's clumsy plan unfolds in an unexpected direction. In 1999, a year before the new century, Bora, who turns seventeen, falls into the fever of first love.
combined_info: Title: 20th Century Girl. Genre: Romance. Keywords: Teenage, Romance, Nostalgia. Overview: Yeon-du asks her best friend Bora to collect all the information she can about Baek Hyun-jin while she is away in the U.S. for heart surgery. In 1999, a year before the new century, Bora, who turns seventeen, falls into the fever of first love.

title: The Godfather
overview: Spanning the years 1945 to 1955, a chronicle of the fictional Italian-American Corleone crime family. When organized crime family patriarch, Vito Corleone barely survives an attempt on his life, his youngest son, Michael steps in to take care of the would-be killers, launching a campaign of bloody revenge.
combined_info: Title: The Godfather. Genre: Crime Drama. Keywords: Crime Family, Organized Crime, Gangster. Overview: Spanning the years 1945 to 1955, a chronicle of the fictional Italian-American Corleone crime family. When organized crime family patriarch, Vito Corleone barely survives an attempt on his life, his youngest son, Michael steps in to take care of the would-be killers, launching a campaign of bloody revenge.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
overview: Framed in the 1940s for the double murder of his wife and her lover, upstanding banker Andy Dufresne begins a new life at the Shawshank prison, where he puts his accounting skills to work for an amoral warden. During his long stretch in prison, Dufresne comes to be admired by the other inmates -- including an older prisoner named Red -- for his integrity and unquenchable sense of hope.
combined_info: Title: The Shawshank Redemption. Genre: Drama. Keywords: Hope, Friendship, Prison. Overview: Framed in the 1940s for the double murder of his wife and her lover, upstanding banker Andy Dufresne begins a new life at the Shawshank prison, where he puts his accounting skills to work for an amoral warden. During his long stretch in prison, Dufresne comes to be admired by the other inmates -- including an older prisoner named Red -- for his integrity and unquenchable sense of hope.

title: The Godfather Part II
overview: In the continuing saga of the Corleone crime family, a young Vito Corleone grows up in Sicily and in 1910s New York. In the 1950s, Michael Corleone attempts to expand the family business into Las Vegas, Hollywood and Cuba.
combined_info: Title: The Godfather Part II. Genre: Crime. Keywords: Continuing Saga, Political Intrigue, Family Legacy. Overview: In the continuing saga of the Corleone crime family, a young Vito Corleone grows up in Sicily and in 1910s New York. In the 1950s, Michael Corleone attempts to expand the family business into Las Vegas, Hollywood and Cuba.

title: Impossible Things
overview: Matilde is a woman who, after the death of her husband - a man who constantly abused her - finds her new best friend in Miguel, her young, insecure, disoriented and even dealer neighbor
combined_info: Title: Impossible Things. Genre: Drama. Keywords: Loss, Friendship, Trauma. Overview: Matilde is a woman who, after the death of her husband - a man who constantly abused her - finds her new best friend in Miguel, her young, insecure, disoriented and even dealer neighbor

title: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
overview: Raj is a rich, carefree, happy-go-lucky second generation NRI. Simran is the daughter of Chaudhary Baldev Singh, who in spite of being an NRI is very strict about adherence to Indian values. Simran has left for India to be married to her childhood fiancé. Raj leaves for India with a mission at his hands, to claim his lady love under the noses of her whole family. Thus begins a saga.
combined_info: Title: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge. Genre: Romantic Comedy. Keywords: Love Saga, Indian, Culture Clash. Overview: Raj is a rich, carefree, happy-go-lucky second generation NRI. Simran is the daughter of Chaudhary Baldev Singh, who in spite of being an NRI is very strict about adherence to Indian values. Simran has left for India to be married to her childhood fiancé. Raj leaves for India with a mission at his hands, to claim his lady love under the noses of her whole family. Thus begins a saga.

title: Schindler's List
overview: The true story of how businessman Oskar Schindler saved over a thousand Jewish lives from the Nazis while they worked as slaves in his factory during World War II.
combined_info: Title: Schindler's List. Genre: Historical. Keywords: Based on a True Story, Holocaust, Drama. Overview: The true story of how businessman Oskar Schindler saved over a thousand Jewish lives from the Nazis while they worked as slaves in his factory during World War II.

title: The Legend of Hei
overview: In the bustling human world, spirits live peacefully with mankind. Luo Xiaohei, a young cat spirit, becomes a nomad after his forest home is destroyed. His natural talent soon attracts spirits and humans alike, but all of them have their own motivations.
combined_info: Title: The Legend of Hei. Genre: Fantasy. Keywords: cat spirit, home destruction, attracting attention. Overview: In the bustling human world, spirits live peacefully with mankind. Luo Xiaohei, a young cat spirit, becomes a nomad after his forest home is destroyed. His natural talent soon attracts spirits and humans alike, but all of them have their own motivations.

title: Dou kyu sei – Classmates
overview: Rihito Sajo, an honor student with a perfect score on the entrance exam and Hikaru Kusakabe, in a band and popular among girls, would have never crossed paths. Until one day they started talking at the practice for their school’s upcoming chorus festival. After school, the two meet regularly, as Hikaru helps Rihito to improve his singing skills. While they listen to each other’s voice and harmonize, their hearts start to beat together.
combined_info: Title: Dou kyu sei – Classmates. Genre: Romance. Keywords: Romance, School, Music. While they listen to each other’s voice and harmonize, their hearts start to beat together.

title: Spirited Away
overview: A young girl, Chihiro, becomes trapped in a strange new world of spirits. When her parents undergo a mysterious transformation, she must call upon the courage she never knew she had to free her family.
combined_info: Title: Spirited Away. Genre: Animation. Keywords: Adventure, Mystery, Courage. Overview: A young girl, Chihiro, becomes trapped in a strange new world of spirits.
